title: FOUR | How a story, became a poem, became a video, over the Skinslam Fanfic contest
body:
Hey guys, [Jason](https://www.youtube.com/jasontheaussie) here.

If you don't know me from my event management, or my youtube channel, you might know me from my writing. In that writing includes a few fan fictions about League of Legends. Last year my piece "[Her Purple Hair](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/12Eobv7b-her-purple-hair-ekko)" made [Froskurinn's Picks](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/ORmqvHsO-fanfiction-contest-the-shortlist), and earlier this year my piece [Immersion](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/ZHTOAXAX-volunteer-ocean-week-story-writing-competition?comment=0000) placed second in the Volunteers fanfic contest ( there was only like 5-7 entries, so it's not as impressive I think )

This time around, I wanted to give myself a bit of a challenge, so I decided to come up with a story, but force myself to reinvent it's format when I was done. Once my story was finished, I thought it'd potentially look great as a poem. Over the next day or two, as I worked on the poem entitled "Four", I felt it was missing something.... and at that point, an old Johnny cash song came on the radio, and it just.... felt right. So, I decided I'd find a basic backing beat somewhere, and turn this into a video.

I'm not great at country accents, so I had [a friend](https://www.youtube.com/user/guckopradley) who is way better than me at country accents come in to try and record it, however we didn't end up finishing stuff, so I was left on my own. Under duress, I finished the video myself. Still unhappy with my accent, I present to you, Four.

[Click here for the video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tvQQL4iwgDU)

[Click here to download just the poem](https://www.dropbox.com/s/w4rtq37jiu94f8d/Four%20by%20Jason.pdf?dl=0)

Enjoy, guys!

replies.body:
I actually love this so much. Seems like you had a lot of fun with the video and the writing is excellent.

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
